title: Shinigami no Ballad - Novel Updates
genre: Drama   Fantasy   Shounen   Slice of Life
tags: Adapted to Anime   Adapted to Drama CD   Adapted to Manga   Familiars   Gods
author: Hasegawa Keisuke   ハセガワ ケイスケ
description: In the darkness stands a girl draped in pure white. Don't let her innocent appearance fool you; her hands grip a glistening scythe. Momo is the dark messenger of death who, along with her wisecracking cat named Daniel, is tasked with releasing humans from their mortal bonds and delivering their souls to the great beyond. First encounters with Momo always end in farewells.>
